title: Squire's Shield
summaries: The Squire's Shield is a shield accessory that increases the player's maximum number of sentries by one and increases summon damage by 10%. It is dropped during the Old One's Army event.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, it is dropped by the Dark Mage with a 25*1/4 (25%) / 50*1/2 (50%) chance and is thus obtainable in pre-Hardmode.

On the [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, it is dropped by the Ogre with a 8.33*1/12 (8.33%) / 12.5*1/8 (12.5%) (T2) or 4.17*1/24 (4.17%) (T3) chance and is thus Hardmode-exclusive.
